title: Loft Layouts*, Playground, On-Call Courtesy Patrol
posting_body: ['$1000 Off your Move in if you move in within 2 weeks!', 'The Richfield Apartments, you will find an exclusive selection of resident amenities chosen to elevate your lifestyle.', 'Enjoy an afternoon at one of our two sparkling swimming pools, stay on top of wellness goals in the state-of-the-art fitness center, and work from home with ease at the business center and Wi-Fi café.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 89', 'OR Text', '89', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 600 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Washer & Dryer Connections', '- Balcony or Patio', '- Newly Renovated Interiors', '- Vaulted Ceilings*', '- Fireplace*', '- Wood-Look Flooring*', '- Loft Layouts*', '- Oversized Closets', '*', 'In Select Homes', 'Community Amenities', '- Two Sparkling Pools', '- On-Site Management', '- Fitness Center', '- Pet-Friendly Community', '- Covered Parking Options', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '- Courtesy Package Acceptance', '- Playground', '- On-Call Courtesy Patrol', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 X the Monthly rent for applicants', '4 times the rent for guarantors', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'The Richfield Apartments', '2134 S Richfield Wy, Aurora, CO, 80013', 'vyxlU9ADlu3W']
